promptVersions.body:
On this Home page, you can:

  • Instantly view your current leave balances (RTT, Paid Leave, etc.)
  • See your latest leave requests and their status
  • Track your monthly leave trends and usage

Click here to view a demo and discover how to manage your requests and balances easily!
promptVersions.description: In-app guidance for the Leave Portal Home page. Shows users their balances, recent requests, and monthly leave trends, and provides a link to the demo.
promptVersions.imageAltText: Screenshot of the Leave Portal home page showing leave balances, recent requests, and a monthly leave trend chart.
promptVersions.title: Your Leave Overview at a Glance
